content: original japanese name さかなさん sakana-san pattern is entirely in japanese but charted no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 8/0 5 0mm hook you will need approximately 15g 22 5 meters of color a and 5g 7 5 meters of color b also available here 1 1 http //www clover co jp/kyan/knit/amigurumi shtml
